languages.text: {n}Фабрикатор-Цензор выпрямляется и расправляет плечи. До вас доносится нарастающий гул, словно где-то начинают работать мощные турбины, а затем — тяжелая поступь и скрежет металла о металл.{/n}
{n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фабрикатор-Цензор выпрямляется и расправляет плечи. До вас доносится нарастающий гул, словно где-то начинают работать мощные турбины, а затем — тяжелая поступь и скрежет металла о металл.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Fabricator straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum, as if from some powerful turbines, and then — heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}
{n}The Fabricator straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum, as if from some powerful turbines, and then — heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}
{n}The Fabricator straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum, as if from some powerful turbines, and then — heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

{n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}
{n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}铸造审查师挺直了背部与肩膀。你听到了一阵嗡嗡声，仿佛是某个马力十足的涡轮机发出来的。随后，你听到了沉重的脚步声与金属的摩擦声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}铸造审查师挺直了背部与肩膀。你听到了一阵嗡嗡声，仿佛是某个马力十足的涡轮机发出来的。随后，你听到了沉重的脚步声与金属的摩擦声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El fabricator-censor endereza la espalda y los hombros. Escuchas un zumbido creciente, como el de una poderosa serie de turbinas, seguidas de pisadas pesadas y el clamor del metal contra el metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El fabricator-censor endereza la espalda y los hombros. Escuchas un zumbido creciente, como el de una poderosa serie de turbinas, seguidas de pisadas pesadas y el clamor del metal contra el metal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ファブリケーター・センサーは背中と肩をまっすぐに伸ばす。まるで強力なタービンが出すブーンという音が聞こえると、重い足音と金属同志が擦れ合う音がした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ファブリケーター・センサーは背中と肩をまっすぐに伸ばす。まるで強力なタービンが出すブーンという音が聞こえると、重い足音と金属同志が擦れ合う音がした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Fabricator-Zensor streckt Rücken und Schultern. Du hörst ein Summen wie von einer leistungsstarken Turbine, gefolgt von schweren Schritten und dem Geräusch, wenn Metall an Metall reibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Fabricator-Zensor streckt Rücken und Schultern. Du hörst ein Summen wie von einer leistungsstarken Turbine, gefolgt von schweren Schritten und dem Geräusch, wenn Metall an Metall reibt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le fabricator-censeur redresse son dos et ses épaules. Vous entendez un vrombissement croissant, semblable à celui de puissantes turbines, suivi de lourds bruits de pas et de frottements métalliques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le fabricator-censeur redresse son dos et ses épaules. Vous entendez un vrombissement croissant, semblable à celui de puissantes turbines, suivi de lourds bruits de pas et de frottements métalliques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Denetçi Fabrikatör, sırtını dikleştirip omuzlarını düzeltiyor. Güçlü türbinlerden geliyormuş gibi yükselen bir uğultu duyuyor, sonrasında ağır ayak sesleri ve metalin metale sürtündüğünü işitiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Fabricator-Censor straightens his back and shoulders. You hear a mounting hum as if from some powerful turbines, followed by heavy footsteps and the grinding of metal against metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Denetçi Fabrikatör sırtını dikleştirip ve omuzlarını düzeltiyor. Güçlü türbinlerden geliyormuş gibi yükselen bir uğultu duyuyorsun, ardından ağır ayak sesleri ve metalin metale sürtünmesi işitiliyor.{/n}
